text: Nimen yingdang zhidao: Nimen suo huode de zhanlipin, wulun shi shenme, dou yingdang yi wu fen zhi yi guizhenzhu, shizhe, zhiqin, gu'er, chipin, luke, ruguo nimen quexin zhenzhu he liang jun jiaofeng er zhen wei pan fen zhi ri, wo suo qishi wo de puren de jixiang. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de.
